enb_long_title: Sixth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
section_title: NOTE BY THE PRESIDENT OF COP-6
sentences: Shortly before 8:00 pm, a Note by the President of COP-6 was distributed to delegates.
The note was presented as an attempt by President Pronk to provide a basis for further negotiations so as to generate momentum, which he believed had stalled.
